lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Finance Minister Dilson Funaro said in a television interview it was "absolutely important" for Brazil and its creditors to renew the short-term credit lines, as Brazil must finance its exports.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Funaro said currently debt negotiations are "very complex and complicated," mentioning cases of countries which had to wait some 10 months before getting a reply from creditors.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The spokesman declined to give details of what was included in the statement, but said Central Bank president Francisco Gros was seeking a 60-day extension of the short-term credit lines from its commercial bank creditors.
